mapper.select: SELECT b.id,b.boardtype, b.nal, b.subject, b.viewcount, (b.thumbup-b.thumbdown), b.doc, q.QnA_horsehead, m.profile_img, m.nickname FROM board b LEFT JOIN QnA_board q ON b.sno = q.sno LEFT JOIN member m ON m.id = b.id WHERE b.sno = ${_parameter}
select hashtag from board where sno=${_parameter}
